# Vendored Dependencies

This directory contains third-party dependencies that are bundled with the project.

## cJSON

- **Version**: 1.7.18
- **Source**: https://github.com/DaveGamble/cJSON
- **License**: MIT License (see LICENSE file)
- **Description**: Ultralightweight JSON parser in ANSI C

cJSON is included directly in the source tree to simplify the build process and remove external dependencies.
